titles.title: Extremely Low Frequency Communication System Termination and Deficit Reduction Act of 1993
A bill to terminate the Extremely Low Frequency Communication System of the Navy.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S8828-8829)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 7/15/1993--Introduced. Extremely Low Frequency Communication System Termination and Deficit Reduction Act of 1993 - Prohibits funds appropriated on or after the date of enactment of this Act for the Department of Defense from being obligated or expended for the Navy's Extremely Low Frequency Communication System (except for termination expenditures).
